summary: A mod that adds 6 new spells
descriptionHtml:
*This mod requires Dawnguard in order to work*
This mod adds 6 new spells. I just wanted to get something out while i work on some other mods so i made this Spell pack. They are not the most well made spells but they work as they should.
The spells can be found either in soul cairn or in riverwood.

The spells in soul cairn can be found in a barrel outside the castle and the spells in riverwood can be found alongside the wall in a "cheat barrel"

Spells
Bound axe
Summon Dawnguard
Counjure Keeper
Soul Drain
Soul Tear
Soul Grip

If you have any suggestions about spells i should make leave them in the comments.
And if there are any problems with the current spells please let me know so i can fix them.
author: Me
